Pound cake (cut into slices) 1 

Strong coffee 3/4 cup 

Caster sugar 1 cup 

Chocolate syrup 1/2 cup 

Cream cheese 8 oz 

Cream 2 cups 

Chocolate covered toffee (chopped) 2 bars

1. Arrange cake slices on bottom of a rectangular dish, cutting cake slices if necessary to fit the bottom of the dish. 

2. Drizzle coffee over cake. 

3. Beat sugar, chocolate syrup, and cream cheese in a bowl until smooth. 

4. Add cream; beat on medium speed until light and fluffy. 

5. Spread over cake. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered toffee. 

6. Spread frosting over cake. Sprinkle with toffee candy. 

7. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, to set dessert and blend flavors. 

8. Toffee Mocha Dessert is ready to serve
